text: Bellegarde-Marsal is a commune. It is in Occitanie in the Tarn department in south France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Bellegarde (the seat) and Marsal.Arrêté préfectoral 18 September 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Tarn
title: Bellegarde-Marsal
